tool_description: Creates and optimizes search indexes from product catalog data to enable fast text-based product searches.

catalog_data_path.description: File path to the product catalog data

index_fields.description: Product fields to include in the search index

index_type.description: Type of search index to build (inverted_index, elasticsearch, solr)

language.description: Language for text processing and stemming

enable_synonyms.description: Whether to include synonym expansion in the index

error_messages: Invalid catalog path: The specified catalog data file does not exist or is not accessible
Empty index fields: At least one field must be specified for indexing
Unsupported index type: Use one of [inverted_index, elasticsearch, solr]
Invalid language: Specify a supported language for text processing
Catalog format error: Product catalog must be in valid JSON or CSV format
usage: Provide the path to product catalog data, specify which fields to index, and choose an index type. The tool builds an optimized search index for fast product retrieval.

index_id.description: Unique identifier for the created search index

index_size_mb.description: Size of the created index in megabytes

build_duration_seconds.description: Time taken to build the index

index_status.description: Status of the index build process
